 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּישׁוֺר‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==distaff== (etymology dubious; perhaps, if meaning correct, from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כשׁר‎</span> (compare [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>§ 216</sup> [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 182</sup>) = ***be straight***, because it stands erect, [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Str|Str]]; [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***industry***; whence [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כּוּשְׁרָא‎</span>, and likewise [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כּוּנְשְׁרָא‎</span>, also [[Prov.3.8|Prov 3:8]], (for Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁר‎</span>), where [[BDB#Levy|Levy]] ***wirbelsäule***, [[BDB#Str|Str]]<sup>on the passage</sup> [[BDB#Jastr|Jastr]] ***navel***; but [[BDB#Str|Str]] doubts etymological connection with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כישׁור‎</span>); — only in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדֶיהָ שִׁלְּחָה בַכִּישׁוֺ֑ר‎</span> [[Prov.31.19|Prov 31:19]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּֽלָךְ ׃‎</span> ***whirl*** of spindle). — As above [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#Str|Str]] [[BDB#RV|RV]] [[BDB#SS|SS]] and others; &gt; [[BDB#Ki|Ki]] [[BDB#AW|AW]] [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Ges|Rob-Ges]] ***whirl*** of spindle ([[BDB#AV|AV]] ***spindle***); see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּלֶךְ‎</span>.
